data.title: Meet Nicky Hilton’s billionaire heir husband, James Rothschild: the British financier hails from a wealthy family and married his hotelier scion wife at Prince William and Kate Middleton’s home
data.meta_description: Nicky Hilton married James Rothschild in a star-studded wedding at Kate Middleton and Prince William’s home in 2015 – so what do we know about the handsome billionaire heir and his wealth?
data.text:
Then again, when you hail from a family with as much money as the Rothschilds, it takes things to a whole new level.

For hotel heiress and erstwhile fashion designer Nicky Hilton – herself thought to be worth US$100 million according to Celebrity Net Worth – marrying into the Rothschild billions has only compounded her wealth.

Together, they’re very, very rich. But what do you do with so much cash?

While they undoubtedly live in the lap of luxury, with the socialite Hilton still moving high fashion and Hollywood circles, Rothschild takes a much more low-key approach. He doesn’t have social media, rarely attends events, and has remained much more private about his lifestyle than his famous wife.

Here’s what you need to know about the handsome scion who hails from one of the world’s richest families:

James Rothschild was born into a very wealthy family

Born and raised in London, James Rothschild hails from one of the most famous European banking dynasties in history, with the Rothschild’s banking roots dating all the way back to the Napoleonic wars in the late 18th century. His parents are Amschel Rothschild, who died by suicide in 1996 according to the Independent, and Anita Patience Guinness, who hails from the Guinness dynasty (yes, the one famous for the Irish beer).

He is a financier

According to his bio on Rockefeller Capital Management, Rothschild is a founder and managing partner of Tru Arrow Partners, “a global growth technology firm built around family capital”. He is also the co-founder of West Arrow, a New York based investment and advisory firm, according to the site.

As a result, he has worked in both London and New York over the course of his career.

The “trillion-dollar wedding” of the century at Kensington Palace

Per the Evening Standard, the two lovebirds met at Formula One heiress Petra Ecclestone’s marriage to James Stunt in 2011.

Hilton previously tied the knot with financier Todd Meister in 2004, whom she married in Las Vegas, but the marriage ended that same year.

He shares three children with Nicky Hilton

The couple have three kids together: two daughters – Theodora “Teddy” Marilyn, five, and Lily-Grace Victoria, seven – and a one-year-old baby boy who was born last July.

Are the Rothschilds richer than the Hiltons?

Although it’s difficult to determine the exact bank balance of anyone, it is without a doubt the Rothschilds that have accumulated the most money over successive generations. In fact the family remains one of the wealthiest in modern history.
